I am Hengjiu Kang, and I received my bachelor's degree Electrical Engineering from University of California, Davis. Now I am working at Inceptio Technology as a software engineer.

I am particularly interested in building stuff and like both hardware and software. On this site, you can find my technical posts, project showcases as well as my footprints.
